inn1.comm: Vaas starts with a dot
and another
a play and a miss as the ball arcs down the channel
more of the same
tight line once more and again a play and a miss, with a great delivery down off which has him pushing forward
even tighter this time, nipping back a touch from outside off and prompting the back-foot defence
starts with one which swings away a touch but begins on leg and the batsman pushes into the leg-side
a touch of movement away outside off, but enough room for the batsman to play into the covers
draws Tendulkar into a forward press away from his body with some movement away from the right hander. Terrific movement
move movemend away, the batsman once more playing away from his body
once again there's movement and a play away. No great pace in the pitch, the ball zooming through to the keeper's knees
Tendulkar finds the gap through the covers and India are off the mark at last
swing on to the legs, and tucked off the legs through square
a hint of width outside off and plenty of bounce, the batsman drawing up on to his back foot as if he's about to waltz, and punch-drives to the covers
outside off, poor length, and that's smashed on the up through the covers, Tendulkar using his body to power through the ball
comes outside the crease and meets the ball on line with leg, driving out to mid-on
testing swing right up there on off, defended on the front foot at the last second after coming down to look to drive
aggression from Vaas there, banging the ball in short and straight and the rise surprised Sehwag who was caught on the upper body
pushed up there on off, tucking up the batsman who didn't have the room he wanted to drive
drifted on to leg, not a bad length, brushed down off the hips with a wristy swivel into midwicket
outside off, short, and fended back down into the covers
on leg, turned off the legs to midwicket, where the fielder gets a hand to it with the dive
outside off, cut down through the gully
on the legs, a touch short and played well off the legs in front of square
on the legs, turned round into midwicket
outside off, pushed off the legs to point
straight, coming in at the batsman who straightens and plays it back to the off-side
comes down the track looking to play out through the covers and completely plays the wrong line, the ball shooting through
on off, played off the legs through fine leg, great shot
on the off side, defended on the back foot
a touch short outside off, played off the back foot through the covers and there's a replay needed as to whether the fielder cut it off inside the rope
worked it out in front of deep midwicket
outside off, a touch short, played off the back foot into the covers
on off, short, and whipped over through midwicket with the wrists, some great timing
outside off, plenty of width, the batsman waits and cuts down, guiding it down through third man
slightly down leg now, and turned off the legs very fine
follows the batsman back behind the stumps with the ball, the batsman coming back to play down the back foot and defend
on middle, turned off the legs on the front foot, to midwicket
pushed down off now on a good length, the batsman comes across and is squared up, just failing to connect with the outside edge
short ball on off, pulled round in front of midwicket
on off, turned round off the legs behind square
a much better line to end the over, and some encouraging rise for the bowler, the batsman jumping into line on the back foot and then electing to leave it
good bounce but Tendulkar picks the gap well through the covers
outside off, Tendulkar looks to come out and hunt it down, driving hard with one leg in the air to the covers
Kulasekara has the breakthrough, banging in a short one outside off, Sehwag waits and opens the face to steer up and over to third man for a straightforward catch
stays over for the left hander, pushing it wide past him down to the keeper
pushed out off the front foot through the covers off a wideish ball and they gamble well on the extra run to Jayasuriya's arm
on leg this time, pushed to short midwicket
a testing length outside off, the ball rising, Tendulkar driving out at it, taking an inside edge and he looks back quickly, wondering if he has chopped on. He hasn't, and survives another ball

a huge wicket, Tendulkar looks to aerial drive over long-on, the ball pinging up off the base of the bat and instead flying wide to deep third man, the fielder running round and taking a high catch at collar-bone height
stays over for this left hander, and has him in immediate trouble, the batsman failing to connect as the ball whooshes past his blade
India's fifty up now with a controlled steer to third man
tries to pull a straight one which is on to him faster than he was expecting
on leg and was aiming further down, the ball helped on its way with a flick off the pads
outside off, mispunched up towards cover but the ball lands safe and the batsmen run through on the misfield
ooh, very close to the edge, Gambhir trying to dab out to third man but nearly took the outside of the bat through to Sangakkara
down the track and the shot of a man who's eye isn't yet in, flapping a cut wildly as the ball pitches wide and moves off the seam wider
comes out and defends on the front foot this time
on leg, good length, and wants to turn it off the legs to midwicket, instead a leading edge pops up safe into the covers
outside off and pushed to the covers this time
restrictive ball just outside off, which nips in a touch and prompts the defensive
similar kind of delivery and again the ball is defended
on leg, waits, and works round behind square
well bowled indeed, a touch of bounce, the batsman looking to play the dab shot but deceived just outside off
jabs out this time, the ball a touch wider and fuller, and they run through
worked a short ball on off into the leg-side for an easy, strike-stealing single
short outside off, the ball hurries on and fools the batsman who's trying to hook down off his nose
outside off, cuts down horribly outside the line of the ball
angled in to the right hander but wide enough to chop down through third man and they scramble back for the second
outside off, good length, pushed towards mid-on for an easy single
outside off, pushed into the covers for a quick single
driven into the covers
dragged down a touch outside off, cut down to the gully and thrown back in quickly
overpitched and again saved by the fielder, with a push to the covers off the back foot
on the legs, pushed in front of square for a quick single
pushed across the left hander, dabbed down to short third man
dragged it a touch short and slower, defended on the back foot
defended on the back foot, pushed into the covers
pushed across the legt hander who drives it into the covers
nipped back in to the right hander who pushes into the covers
outside off, pushed to short midwicket, the batsman watching patiently
right up there, pushed off the back foot defensively
outside off, pressed down defensively into the gully
down the track, goes for the big booming on-drive, worked into short midwicket in the end
a quick single first up
rocks back and doesn't get his head down to meet one on off, nearly toe-ending a catch back to the bowler
on off, swung a touch away and on the rise, the ball crashing into the gloves as the batsman looks to cut to gully
slower ball, pushed into the covers
an easy single now, jogged through
dragged down a touch outside off, the batsman waits and connects cleanly with a forceful cut through point
this one was rarely veering down leg and India take the five wides, Gambhir shaping up to tickle round the corner
played on the front foot
swivelled in on the front foot, a stab and a defence
outside off, turned down towards fien leg but stops on the shot, the ball going behind to the keeper who readies for a stumping/run-out chance
down the track, opens the shoulders and drives up and over extra cover, bissecting the field and that is a great shot, full of power
turned off the legs this time
right up there on off, defended on the front foot
outside off, played down through third man
angled in at him and he defends on the back foot
right up there on off, played back down into the off-side
down the track and flashes another cover drive, this one a touch squarer, behind point in fact and that travels away
right up there, squeezed into the off-side and Sharma is quick but the underarmed direct hit is close...ah, he's safe
pushed across the right hander who defends down off the back foot
on off, defended back down
driven out to the covers
right up there, and turned off the legs to midwicket
outside off and defended down
forced hard down leg, but too far
turned on to the legs again, and makes room to play off through square
comes down to defend, gets the outside edge towards third man
down the track to meet a straight one and launch it over extra cover again
a cut dabbed down behind point
driven forward for a quick single
outside off, cut down through gully
on middle and leg, turned off the legs high to midwicket and it bounces once in front of the deep fielder
outside off, cut down off the back foot through gully
outside off, cut down off the back foot to gully
short outside off, high bounce over the batsman's head
followed the right hander on to the legs, up there, and defended on the front foot
outside off, wide, and pushed up to the covers with a scoop
cut away outside off
a mix-up there, and the dangerous Gambhir is run out at the non-striker's end after the ball was dabbed to point, thrown back to Malinga who helps onto the stumps with a reverse flick
on the legs, pushed out to midwicket for a well-run two
on off, tight, defended forward
defended this time
outside off, pushed to point for another well-run two
outside off, pushed to point now
swept up high to square but lands safe
banged in on off and middle and pulled high and over square
on off, short, and swivel-pulled round through midwicket
on off, the batsman backed away and the ball just leapt over the sticks
right up there at yorker length, and pushed into short midwicket
defended quietly now
a direct hit from the covers would have had him that time
down on one knee and that came right out of the middle, the slog sweep up and over midwicket and all the way
up there on off, pushed into the covers this time
on middle and leg, driven on the front foot to midwicket
comes out and defends in the end
bark of an appeal from Sangakkara, asking if the ball came back from leg to hit middle-and-leg, leg-byes are given following the swivel off the knee roll
defended this time
worked into the covers, a push and run through
banged down on middle, the ball didn't get up quite as much as expected, the batsman taking his eyes off as he pulls to midwicket
pushed forward and the batsmen scramble back into their creases, Sharma looking for the tip-and-run
banged in short and pulled hard through the gap around midwicket, to bring up his first boundary of his innings
strays on to leg and Dhoni picks out the gap wide of the fielder and they run back, chancing the arm
right up there, and dug back out through mid-off
low full toss, driven hard to mid-off, not quite making the most of it
outside off, hit hard again, this time picking out cover
short outside off and Dhoni this time picks out the spot between mid-off and cover, this one travelling
defended on the front foot now
worked out in front of midwicket this time
skewed this one fine off the pads

the yorker, plenty of air, Dhoni digs that out, the ball spinning back towards the stumps but spins away from them in the end, the pair running through and the bowler nearly pushing the ball on with his feet
backs away, deliberately exposing his stumps as he drives inside-out and hard out of the bottom of the bat up and over the covers
cheeky, oh my, the bowler did well to angle the ball into him and it rose, the batsman standing tall and knocking it back straight past the keeper
taken off the toes and pushed off the legs in front of square
reverse sweep, beautiful shot in line with off to bring up the fifty partnership
outside off, driven off the back foot into the covers
great fielding from Kapugedara who just managed to get a hand on it with a big dive and gets up quickly to get the ball back to the keeper and keep them to three
yorker, right up there, and defended on the front foot
moves way outside his stumps and the ball follows him, the batsman forced to defend at the last second
right up there on off and middle, driven out to wide long-off and there's a fumble from Maharoof in the deep
outside off, driven deep and square in front of point this time
outside off ready for a premeditated sweep back through fine leg, just avoiding the fielder in the air
right up there on off, played round behind square this time
on off, attempts a pull through midwicket, ends up forcing it through mid-on and picked up a good two
up there on off, forced out off the front foot into the covers
a very tight run-out decision coming back for the second from the drive to mid-on and given out on the line with the throw back to Sangakkara who crashes the ball on to the stumps in the nick of time
wastes no time smashed from outside off pulled hard in front of square
driven out to mid-on
outside off, cut hard off the front foot hard through point
stabbed down hard on it, worked out to square
yorker outside off, backs away and stabs at it with an aerial pop up to wide mid-off
follows him down leg, digging in the bouncer too, pulling out of the hook
backs away behind the stumps and drives up and over the covers out towards the boundary
outside off, slower ball, the batsman backs away and adjusts for the pace, steering down off the back foot

inn2.comm: Sreesanth starts with an overstepped no-ball and therefore there is a free hit, to be faced by Dilshan
short, veering towards leg and pulled hard in front of leg
slower ball, deceives the batsman into playing away from his body, stabbing late into the ground
on middle and leg, a touch short and that's scooped high and over long-on, not quite timing it, however
outside off, wideish, and Jayasuriya crashes an electric aerial cover drive on its way to the ropes
a swish outside off this time
outside off, better length, defended now
good wheels from Sharma, and testing bounce too, past Jayasuriya's outside edge
nipped back in from outside leg, tucked off the legs in front of square
short ball, pulled round, completely missed the ball
inside-edged nearly back onto the stumps and it runs away
outside off, cut hard to deep point
pushed through outside off, left alone now, the ball crashing onto the pads
cut through gully
went to lift it, missed and the ball goes down bounces past the keeper and a direct throw to the non-striker's end would have been out
probably the shot of the day, the batsman lifting that off the toes and over midwicket. An effortless flick, really, but one with immense timing
a very wide down off
not the shot you want to be playing to that ball which lashed past the left hander's outside edge down off as he shaped to rock back and smash through the off-side, the ball going under the edge
more room outside off and he cuts hard through the covers this time

Sreesanth again gets the treatment, he's bowling too wide and this one is also too short, Jayasuriya jumps up and smashes the ball while he's in the air, Matrix-like, flaying it hard over backward point

a huge swish and Jayasuriya doesn't much about that one, going for the up and over cover, but instead a huge outside edge flies up with a long thin parabola and back down over third man where even the long legs of Ishant Sharma can't carry the fielder round in time
going across him, defended down on the back foot down towards third man
outside off, swivel pulls behind square and races through
down on one knee, goes to hit it over his own shoulder, and completely misses
plays down off the back foot into the covers
gone now and Ishant celebrates hard as Jayasuriya turns a delivery outside leg down through fine, the bounce at an awkward angle and taken behind
outside off and left alone
turned off the legs to fine - quite literally as it turned down
right up there on off and defended on the front foot
outside off and a headrush of a horrible shot from Sanga, flapping at a wide one and not at all connecting
played round to fine
defended on the front foot this time
defended on the front foot
tries to swing it from outside off through midwicket
that one goes through outside off
another dot as that goes through
free hit is smashed up to midwicket
turned off the front foot in front of midwicket
on middle, backs away and launches that one over extra cover
digs out the yorker and the outside edge splays in a controlled way through third man
outside off, a game flash from down on one knee but does not connect
outside off, worked out to gully now
stays over the wicket for the right hander who drives a good shot, picking the gap, through cover
tight outside off, driven through the covers
a huge shout for one which pitched just outside leg and would have gone on to hit leg stump
outside off, pushed down to third man
played safely into the covers off the back foot
he strikes first ball! Sangakkara down the track and doesn't get hold of the aerial drive to wide mid-on
Jayawardene waits as the ball comes in on middle and is tucked out to midwicket
defended on the front foot
hit just outside the line, Harbhajan very excited but to no avail
outside off, pushed past the outside edge
on middle and off, driven off the legs through midwicket
gentle outswing on leg, tucked to short midwicket
oh dear, way down leg
right up there and pushed back out to mid-on
driven again to mid-on
driven out to mid-off now
a touch short, on leg, and swivel-pulled out to midwicket
to midwicket again, this time an ease off the front foot
right up there on off, good loop, and worked out ot midwicket on the front foot
right up there again on off, defended on the front foot this time
on middle, pushed round to the 45 on the front foot, a sweep really
on middle, driven out wide to mid-on
down the track and drives one outside off back to the bowler
right on middle, again driven back to the bowler
tucked him up with a short and straight one, defended down
just wide down leg
a touch of arc from middle, defended on the front foot
touch of width outside off and the batsman makes more room, cutting through the covers
pushed down leg, the batsman gets down on the ball and pushes it in front of square
down leg, wide again
in on middle, pushed back out off the back foot through point
on leg and pushed out to mid-on
on off, and driven out in front of midwicket
room outside off and cut hard to point
on leg, knocked in front of midwicket for an easy single
dragged it down slightly, but still on a good line on off, pushed out to mid-on
turned round in front of square
outside off, pushed to Yuvraj in the covers and it could have been close had he hit the non-striker's stumps direct
turned from straight into midwicket this time
turns back in, the batsman backs away exposing his stumps and makes plenty of room to cut hard
outside off, played on the back foot
driven out easily in front of the covers
outside off, driven to long-off and they get through comfortably
extra loop on middle, driven out through long-off
worked off the legs in front of midwicket
tucked off the legs now
outside off, cut down through third man
on middle and leg, turned through the 45
down the track and pulled hard through midwicket
outside off, cut down to third man
pushed down the off-side first up
outside off, cut hard off the back foot in front of point
outside off, a touch straighter, still cut to point
outside off, a touch short, and smacks hard over cow corner, the ball just plugging in front of Uthappa
a top-edge pull goes all the way
outside off, and out through point again off the back foot, funbled inside the boundary and there's the fifty, from 46 balls with five fours and a six
outside off, cut late with a neat dink through third man, just past the keeper
played off the legs behind square
slower ball on the legs, turned down behind square
on middle, driven out through mid-off and there's a slide from Jayawardene but he makes it pretty well in the end
defended on the front foot
cut hard off the back foot through point
worked into the leg-side
turned off the legs square once more
down leg, turned through fine leg
on off, turned off the legs through midwicket
right up there and defended on the front foot
turned off the legs just in front of square
turned off the legs through the 45 for a forthright four
pulled round again but didn't quite time it
angled on to leg, driven forward to mid-on
outside off, cut down into the covers, there's a run and a free hit next ball because of the overstep
outside off cut off the back foot to the man at point
shorter ball leaps over the outside edge down off
nipped back in from outside off, and turned in front of square
down the track and doesn't get hold of a firm pull to midwicket
stays over the wicket, the right hander driving the ball into his foot
driven out through long-off for an easy four
left alone outside off
on off and middle, swiped through long-off for two
on off and a repeat of the shot seals the victory
